Fastrack Reflex Tunes FB1 Wireless Neckband

Fastrack Reflex Tunes FB1 Neckband features advanced wireless technology for a stable, seamless audio experience. The 6 mm dynamic drivers deliver powerful, clear sound with deep bass and balanced treble. The Reflex Tunes FB1 Neckband is also equipped with an integrated microphone and easy-to-use controls for hands-free calling and convenient music navigation. This neckband offers up to 7 hours of battery life with the 250 mAh lithium polymer battery. And with its lightweight and flexible design, the Fastrack Reflex Tunes FB1 Wireless Neckband is the perfect choice for active lifestyles.
